thread.title: A unified Korea shares Olympic first on the ice

title: A unified Korea shares Olympic first on the ice
text:
A unified Korea shares Olympic first on the ice 4:54pm GMT - 01:49 
Japan carried the day on Wednesday when the long-time national rivalry with North Asian neighbors North and South Korea spilled on to Olympic ice, beating Korea's unified women's ice hockey team 4-1 in a game of firsts for both teams. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
